r.s: Pingback+webmention client and server implementation for PHP 5.3+.
r.d: Customizable and unit-tested Pingback and webmention client and server implementation.
r.n: - Rename Services_Pingback to Services_Linkback - Add webmention client and server support, http://webmention.org/ - Use HTTP2 package to parse link headers - XHTML responses get loaded as XML, not HTML - Support relative URLs in HTML links
